item.title: A t|ket> Implementation of Shor's Algorithm

item.title: An Introduction to Combinatory Logic

item.title: Rubik's Cubes with a sprinkle of combinatorics and group theory.
item.description: A short talk given during a 'Quick fire Talk' organized by the Malta Mathematical Society.
